member.name: T:Lucene.Net.Analysis.Snowball.SnowballAnalyzer
member.summary:
Filters {@link StandardTokenizer} with {@link StandardFilter}, {@link LowerCaseFilter}, {@link StopFilter} and {@link SnowballFilter}.
Available stemmers are listed in {@link SF.Snowball.Ext}. The name of a stemmer is the part of the class name before "Stemmer", e.g., the stemmer in {@link EnglishStemmer} is named "English".

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Analysis.Snowball.SnowballAnalyzer.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Builds the named analyzer with no stop words.

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Analysis.Snowball.SnowballAnalyzer.#ctor(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Builds the named analyzer with the given stop words.

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Analysis.Snowball.SnowballAnalyzer.TokenStream(System.String,System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Constructs a {@link StandardTokenizer} filtered by a {@link StandardFilter}, a {@link LowerCaseFilter} and a {@link StopFilter}.

member.name: T:Lucene.Net.Analysis.Snowball.SnowballFilter
member.summary:
A filter that stems words using a Snowball-generated stemmer.
Available stemmers are listed in {@link SF.Snowball.Ext}. The name of a stemmer is the part of the class name before "Stemmer", e.g., the stemmer in {@link EnglishStemmer} is named "English".

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Analysis.Snowball.SnowballFilter.#ctor(Lucene.Net.Analysis.TokenStream,System.String)
member.summary: Construct the named stemming filter.

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Analysis.Snowball.SnowballFilter.Next
member.summary: Returns the next input Token, after being stemmed
